AttackerCapabilities: Ability to write and run Python scripts
Familiarity with web requests using the requests library

Vulnerabilities: SQL injection vulnerability in the username field

Steps.Description: Exploit the SQL injection vulnerability in the username field to retrieve the password

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker suspects that the username field is vulnerable to SQL injection and wants to retrieve the password
StepDetails.Action: Craft an SQL injection payload in the username field to check if the password matches a specific pattern
StepDetails.Result: If the password matches the pattern, append the next character to the password variable and print the password
